CIBC Swap VolumesForwarded by Sanjeev KhannaNAEnron on PM Brian Otis PM To Sanjeev nron cc Subject CIBC Swap Volumes Sanjeev Currently KCS Energy has a five year swap with CIBC that is currently outofthemoney by approximately MM What we are considering is to require KCS to use part of the proceeds that we advance through a VPP to pay off this position However based on the assumption of a declining price market we would like to give them the ability to recoup a portion of the MM paid to CIBC through either Put Swaptions or Puts that are to outofthemoney Attached is a spread sheet that has the volumes that KCS currently has swaps on with CIBC Could you please provide pricing for the following scenarios Put Swaptions atthemoney outofthemoney and outofthemoney for the following terms begining in July a through b through c through d through e through Puts atthemoney outofthemoney and outofthemoney for the following terms beginning April a through If you have any questions give a call Thanks Brian Otis x
